DOC.detailed_description: Objective : The main objective present study determine short- mid-term effect coffee , oxidative stress parameter human . Study design : randomize , placebo-controlled , investigator-blinded , 3-arm parallel Study population : 168 apparently healthy volunteer : male female age > =35 < = 65 year . Intervention : The treatment consist daily consumption either : Treatment 1 : 0.45 L coffee ( 3 cup ) 0.30 L bottle water daily ; Treatment 2 : 0.75 L coffee ( 5 cup ) daily ; Treatment 3 : 0.75 L water daily Duration treatment intervention 8 week . Before intervention period start , run-in period five week subject maintain low antioxidant diet ( Dutch average ) conduct subject order standardize antioxidant intake subject . Main study parameters/endpoints : Mean level % T measure DNA oxidative damage week 8 . Secondary outcome mean level 8-isoprostane 24 hr urine .
